abstract: Sales of the company’s Lyrica pain pill and its Enbrel arthritis medicine topped analysts’ predictions.
snippet: Sales of the company’s Lyrica pain pill and its Enbrel arthritis medicine topped analysts’ predictions.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer, the world’s biggest drug maker, reported second-quarter profit that topped analysts’ estimates as sales of pain medicines offset declining revenue from expired patents.

headline.main: Sales of Pain Drugs Help Pfizer’s Profit Beat Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Sales of Pain Drugs Help Pfizer’s Profit Beat Forecasts
